function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adherence to hygiene standards in buildings leading to disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols and standards for cleaning and disinfection","Technologies":"Smart sensors for monitoring air quality, UV-C disinfection technology","People":"Inhabitants of buildings, visitors, and workers","Owner":"Building managers, maintenance staff, and facility management"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air quality in indoor spaces","Impact":"Higher risk of airborne disease transmission and respiratory issues","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems and air filtration, promoting outdoor air circulation","Technologies":"HVAC systems with HEPA filters, air purifiers, natural ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, especially those with respiratory conditions","Owner":"Building owners, facility management, and HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Insufficient space per person and overcrowding in living spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of person-to-person transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Designing and regulating living spaces for adequate social distancing, reducing overcrowding","Technologies":"Space optimization and occupancy monitoring systems, modular furniture for flexible use of space","People":"Residents and occupants of living spaces","Owner":"Architects, city planners, and housing developers"}]}
